title: Be Well - Real Estate’s Buzziest Amenities
description: Wellness amenities are a must for luxury homes, with buyers expecting an array of options—from infrared saunas to state-of-the-art air filtration systems—as standard features. Others go straight to the source, opting for branded residences attached to resorts with world-class wellness programs. Join Anna Bjurstam, strategic advisor and wellness pioneer for Six Senses and Raison d’Etre, in conversation with Mansion Global reporter Leslie Hendrickson about wellness options for the home, whether that’s a Los Angeles mansion or a chalet at the Six Senses Residences Kitzbuehel Alps.
